Docs.summary: Indicates whether a data field is editable.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The presence of the EditableAttribute attribute on a data field indicates whether the user should be able to change the field's value.
This class neither enforces nor guarantees that a field is editable. The underlying data store might allow the field to be changed regardless of the presence of this attribute.
